'''2.2.3201''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), '''2.2.3202''' ([[wikipedia:MacOS|macOS]]), or '''2.2.3200''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]), is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on June 22, 2021.

== Changes ==
* Updated error messaging to support migration from Mojang accounts to Microsoft accounts.
* Updated text and improved Linux stability.
